entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Waskaganish
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:55 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -24.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Waskaganish Airport 2:00 PM EST Saturday 28 January 2023
Temperature: -24.4°C
Pressure: 102.1 kPa
Humidity: 64 %
Wind Chill: -37
Dewpoint: -29.2°C
Wind: W 22 km/h gust 32 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. Temperature falling to minus 26 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature falling to minus 26 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 39 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 35.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 35. Wind chill minus 36 this evening and minus 41 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023
